# mig specification v1

Any .mig should follow the following:
```mig
<width> <height>
<pixel information>
```
every pixel should follow the [hex color format](https://www.w3schools.com/colors/colors_hexadecimal.asp)

# what is a pixel in mig?
this is a red pixel in mig:
`#ff0000`
this is a 1x2(width, height) image
```mig
#ff0000
#ff0000
```

example:
```mig
16 16
#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000
#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000#ff0000
```
